Title: Angels & Demons
Overview: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is recruited by the Vatican to investigate the apparent return of the Illuminati - a secret, underground organization - after four cardinals are kidnapped on the night of the papal conclave.
Tagline: The holiest event of our time. Perfect for their return.
Keywords: rome, vatican, based on novel, symbolism, christian, illuminati, quantum mechanics, prequel, anti matter, conspiracy, investigator, catholicism, cern
production_companies: Columbia Pictures, Imagine Entertainment, Panorama Films, Skylark Productions
Cast: Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer
